snippet: The Republican Party is in the midst of a gender war, with men and women taking sharply different stances over accusations of groping by Mr. Trump....
abstract: Donald Trump has split men and women to unprecedented degree both within 2016 election and Republican party; Republican women have increasingly criticized Trump's male supporters for defending Trump against charges of sexual assault; analysts anticipate largest voting gender gap in decades.
lead_paragraph: The Republican Party is in the midst of a gender war, with men and women taking sharply different stances over accusations of groping by Mr. Trump.

headline.main: Abandoning Donald Trump and, for Some Women, the G.O.P., Too
headline.print_headline: A Gender War Erupts in the G.O.P. as Some Women Draw a Line at Trump
